namespace.description: The Kubernetes namespace to deploy the chart into. (default: 'default')

cluster.description: Information about the Kubernetes cluster to deploy to

name.description: An alias to use for the cluster within this step

connection.description: The Kubernetes cluster connection to use for this step

server.description: The cluster URL to connect to

certificateAuthority.description: The PEM-encoded CA certificate of the cluster

token.description: An access token to use for authenticating to the cluster

credentials.description: A map of cert credentials to use for accessing the tiller controller in the cluster.
